awe6.core.TextStyle

type
class
implements
awe6.interfaces.ITextStyle
The TextStyle class provides a minimalist implementation of the ITextStyle interface.

For API documentation please review the corresponding Interfaces.

Constructor

new(?p_font : String, ?p_size : Float, ?p_color : Int, ?p_isBold : Bool, ?p_isItalic : Bool, ?p_align : awe6.interfaces.ETextAlign, ?p_spacingHorizontal : Float, ?p_spacingVertical : Float, ?p_thickness : Float, ?p_filters : Array<Dynamic>)

filters : Array<Dynamic>
